availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, miller. Married to Nancy Abbot Barber in Bath County, Kentucky, on December 5, 1839. Father of Andrew Barber, Margarett Barber, Sarah A. Barber, John Barber, and Thomas Barber. Miller in Morgan County in 1850. Miller in Morgan County in 1860. Appointed Postmaster for West Liberty, Kentucky, in 1861 and in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 106.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273004.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 147, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
